question: Sethu, Tarang, Tejas, Savir are code names of which of the following?
explanation: Sethu, Tarang, Anant, Tejas, Savir and Anokha are the names of successive versions of Bharat Operating System Solutions – BOSS. It is free and open source operating system based on Linux. The latest version is BOSS v5.0 and it was codenamed Anokha.
